summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 16071, entitled "An Ordinance imposing certain duties upon the Board of Public Works in relation to the granting and issuing to corporations and persons of permits for the construction of street and other railroads, telegraph, telephone, and electric light lines, and repealing Ordinance No. 2734, entitled "An Ordinance imposing certain duties upon the Board of Public Works in relation to the granting and issuing to corporations and persons of permits for the construction of street and other railroads, telegraph, telephone and electric light lines," approved April 29, 1893," approved May 29, 1907.
